title: CompTIA Cloud+ Basic
headline: Learn how to effectively and efficiently make use of CompTIA Cloud+ with this free online training course.
description: This free online CompTIA Cloud+ Basic course will give you an introduction the benefits of cloud computing, and teach you about cloud service models, cloud delivery models, cloud infrastructure terminology, and object storage concepts. You will look into the types of data storage and networking, optimizing the network, routing, switching and protocols. You will also study RAID, storage technologies, and accessing and provisioning storage.
courseDescription:
This training course, CompTIA Cloud+ Basic, will provide you with an understanding of the basics of cloud concepts and models. You will learn about cloud service models, cloud deployment models, cloud essential terminology, and object storage concepts. You will be able to explain the service and delivery models used, as well as terminology for cloud services. You will also learn about concepts related to the storage of data and objects.

This course then explains the function of data storage and networking. You will learn about disk types and configurations, understanding RAID, examining file systems, storage technologies, accessing storage, and provisioning storage. You will also learn about the different types of RAID storage and how they function.

This course then wraps up by discussing network infrastructure. You will learn about network types, how to optimize the network, routing and switching of networks, and about network ports and protocols. By taking this course you will learn the basics of CompTIA Cloud+ concepts, storage, and infrastructure. So why wait? Start learning about cloud technology concepts, networking, and infrastructure with the free online CompTIA Cloud+ Basics training course today.
